# define qc color scheme

```{r}
  qc_colors <- tibble::data_frame(qc = c("ok", "maybe", "bad"),
                                  color= c("#009E73", "#56B4E9", "#E69F00"))

  saveRDS(qc_colors, file = "../../r_data/qc_colors.RDS")
```

# define lod shape scheme

```{r}
  lod_shape <- tibble::data_frame(lod = c("above", "below"),
                                  color= c(16, 17))

  saveRDS(lod_shape, file = "../../r_data/lod_shape.RDS")
```
